name: Noriko for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Noriko is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in a Osaka, Japan, Noriko and her family moved to United States when she was 3 years old. From her childhood Noriko spoke both, Japanese and English languages.

When she was a kid, Noriko was always excited to learn new vocabulary. When she was in first grade, her teacher taught her that "shin" was another word for leg.

Later that day, Noriko was walking with her mom, when Noriko tripped and hit her leg on the ground really hard. She yelled out "OW, MY SHIN" although her mom heard "OW, MY SHIT." She started yelling about how that was a bad word and good people didn't say that word, and she was going to wash Noriko's mouth out with soap. Noriko was a crying, bawling mess of a child, to the point she was doing that weird cry, stutter, hiccup noise. Mother paused in berating her and said "Who taught you that word?!" Of course, Noriko told the truth and said "M-m-my teacher t-t-t-taught me that word!" and mom started ranting about how she was going to call the school and get that teacher yelled at.

Noriko tried to explain, "T-te-teacher said that shin meant leg I'm SO SORRY ILL N-N-NE-ne-never say it again." Mom got quiet and realized her mistake. "...What did you say?"

Of course Noriko started crying harder and she said "NO it's just a test you're going to wash my mouth out with soap again."

When she finally calmed down enough to say it again, the mom apologized and to this day Noriko always say "shin" loudly just to see her face blush.

Noriko is very sexy girl, she loves tattoos and loud parties, but she has one strong rule in her life, she does not use foul language.

Help Noriko to take her place on the street!

short_description: Noriko is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
